title: Tuface Cancels Protest Against Buhari’s Government

organizations.name: tuface cancels protest against buhari’s government tuface cancels protest against buhari

text:
Tuface Cancels Protest Against Buhari’s Government Deolu February 5, 2017 
Tuface Idibia has cancelled the planned February 6 protest. 
The music superstar posted a video announcing the cancellation. 
“Dear Nigerians!!! Due to security concerns and public safety consideration,I hereby announce the cancellation of the planned March.” 
“The protest is under serious threat of hijack by interests not aligned with our ideals,” he said. 
The Lagos State Police Command had backed down on its threat to stop the nationwide protest. 
Police Commissioner, Fatai Owoseni, disclosed that both sides met and resolved to modify their hard line positions. 
He said: “We had a meeting with the protesters and we explained to them why we advised against the protest. 
“A pro-government group wants to protest that same day and we don’t want a situation where there would be friction. 
“We also don’t want hooligans to hijack the process and injure the protesters. After explaining to them, they said they will go back and discuss with others. 
“They said if they decide to go ahead, they won’t demonstrate but would assemble at a point and read their demands. 
“That notwithstanding, we have resolved to provide security for them. It is our responsibility and we won’t shy away from it. We will ensure trouble makers do not hijack the process.” 
The Presidency had also declared that it wasn’t against the protest, admiting that citizens are free to express themselves peacefully. Recommended for you
